// Survey CONFERENCE APPLICATION CONFERENCE SURVEY Registration is not complete unless payment is received; nonetheless cancellation not made at least ten (10) days before date of Conference will attract 50% of the cost. No refund for cancellation on the day of Conference In order to continuously improve the MIND App, this survey has been developed to gather feedback regarding how well your experiences in using the App have met your expectations. We value your honest and detailed responses. Your responses are completely anonymous.
